Class Player

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Child class of Entity, used to create the player in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class entities.Entity

    debug, height, hitBox, isAlive, player, speed, width, x, y

    • killNPC

      public boolean killNPC()
      Method that checks if the player is attacking and if the attack hitbox intersects with an NPC. If so, the NPC is removed from the list of NPCs in the level.
      Returns:

    • manageKeyPickup

      public void manageKeyPickup()
      Method that checks if the player is colliding with the key and if the player is equipped. If so, the key is picked up and the player is equipped with the key.

    • equipWeapon
